name.value: Nictiz Geboortezorg - Client - Scenario 1.2 - Retrieve Integrale Zwangerschapskaart resources of current pregnancy of Hanna Kooij

description.value: Scenario 1.2: Retrieve Integrale Zwangerschapskaart resources of current pregnancy of Hanna Kooij
Query Patient resource for HCIM Patient
Test PHR client to retrieve Patient resources.
Confirm that HTTP header Authorization contains the patient token ${patient-token-id}
Confirm that the operation was succesful
Test Client query operation for MaternalRecord (EpisodeOfCare)
Test PHR client to retrieve EpisodeOfCare resources.
Confirm that HTTP header Authorization contains the patient token ${patient-token-id}
Confirm that the operation was succesful
Confirm that the returned resource type is Bundle.
Confirm that the returned searchset Bundle contains 1 EpisodeOfCare entry.
Confirm that the returned resource type is Bundle.
Confirm that the returned searchset Bundle contains 1 Organization entry.
Confirm that the returned resource type is Bundle.
Confirm that the returned searchset Bundle contains 1 Practitioner entry.
Confirm that the returned searchset Bundle contains 1 Practitioner resource(s).

Confirm that the returned searchset Bundle contains 1 Condition entry.
